column2: Sidetrack - The Wall
What you'll do
A new instruction opens new possibilities to solve the riddles.
Great work with the second part of Sidetrack! Let's head back into Sidetrack and get across that wall!
Launch Sidetrack from the desktop.
So Riley you wanted to show us how to CRUNCH the wall with code.
Not crunching, more like pushing out of the way. But yes, let's use code. {{user_name}} can you please flip the app once more?
Click the Flip button.
Type in riley.push(); That's the cool new Instruction. You might as well replace that riley.jump; at position 2, right? A jump Instruction won't help us in this level.
When my avatar is lined up with a Wall and about to crash into a wall, PUSH is just what is needed. Suddenly I'm so strong I can actually move Walls! Let’s give it a try!
When you add a push Instruction, you'll see it on the front of the app. That means you can drag and drop the Instruction into a different position.

Look at all these jumps! Not useful at all! Obvi you can't jump over a Wall or a Robot! jump only works for Pits. However, you can push Walls and Robots! Whoever put all these jumps here must not have had access to the push Instruction.
If you change all the jump Instructions to push in the Hack panel, I think these Instructions will work!

One more thing – for push to work, you need to have space next to the obstacle you're pushing. In other words, whatever you push needs a space to move to! It makes sense, right? To get through this level, only use push for one column of Walls at a time.
If the space to the right of what you're pushing is blocked, push won't work!
Rewrite the Instructions in the Hack panel until you've got the Instructions you need.
This level looks familiar.
But now you can push your enemies :)
Let's step aside for a moment and give some room for {{user_name}} to explore himself. Enough of the talking.
Congrats {{user_name}}! You are doing great. Can you use the push instruction to do the moonwalk at the end?
I don't have to get that Faber, do I? Is that another one of your 80s references?
Sort of, if you use several push instructions in a row it looks like Riley is break dancing :)
Hint: If you push the enemy away you can not solve the puzzle.
This one looks like a great challenge!
I admire your enthusiasm Ada, but...
Hold on to that Saniel, I want to solve the riddle by myself.
I don't see any way that ANY set of Instructions could ever solve this level!
That is what I was trying to say. Riley?
Indded. Not beatable with what you have right now. Time for another break. Anyone for tea and scones?

Press a bell and a moment later
Up you go in an elevator
